title.rendered: Minecraft: create & rent servers for multiplayer

content.rendered:
The setup is quick and easy. In our test, we didn’t need five minutes to be able to play together. Aternos provides extensive explanations on how to properly configure the server. The support should react quickly, even if users sometimes unstable performance to complain

Servers are shutting down, if no players are online for several minutes. Before use, the server must be started up in the user center. Particularly useful: Modpacks, plugins and your own worlds can be integrated easily and without any problems. If you are interested in mods in Minecraft, we recommend you take a look at the linked article.

Free private servers

Individuals who still have unused resources available on their server sometimes offer free shared use in the Minecraft forum. In return, a sponsorship expected in the form of attribution when entering the server. Other players warn of dubious offers. However, these are only very rarely advertised.

Especially at attributions the operators try to keep the servers stable. No provider wants to be known in the forum through unstable servers. However, depending on the provider, it can take a while to get in touch, so that problems cannot always be solved immediately.

Which paid game servers are worth it?

If you need more RAM than Aternos provides and you can’t find what you’re looking for in the Minecraft forum, you have to rent servers for a fee. The more players are supposed to play on the server at the same time, the more expensive the monthly rent will be.
